Package controller

Class ApplicantController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ApplicantController
  • public class ApplicantController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for managing all applicant-related business logic. Handles BTO application creation, management, flat booking, and enquiry functionality. Provides methods to check eligibility, filter projects, and manage applications.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ApplicantController()
      Default constructor for the ApplicantController.

    • Method Detail

      • getEligibleProjects

        public java.util.ArrayList<Project> getEligibleProjects​(Applicant applicant)
        Retrieves all projects that an applicant is eligible to apply for. This includes visible projects that match eligibility criteria or projects the applicant has already applied for.
        Parameters:
        applicant - The applicant to check eligibility for
        Returns:
        List of projects the applicant is eligible to apply for

      • getFilteredProjects

        public java.util.ArrayList<Project> getFilteredProjects​(Applicant applicant,
                                                        Filter filter)
        Filters eligible projects based on specified criteria.
        Parameters:
        applicant - The applicant whose eligible projects should be filtered
        filter - The filter criteria to apply
        Returns:
        List of projects matching the filter criteria

      • getAppliedProjects

        public java.util.ArrayList<Project> getAppliedProjects​(Applicant applicant)
        Retrieves all projects that an applicant has applied for. Includes projects with applications in various states including pending, successful, unsuccessful, and booked.
        Parameters:
        applicant - The applicant whose applications to retrieve
        Returns:
        List of projects the applicant has applied for

      • createApplication

        public BTOApplication createApplication​(Applicant applicant,
                                        Project project,
                                        FlatTypeEnum flatType)
        Creates a new BTO application for an applicant. Checks eligibility, ensures the applicant has no active applications, and creates a pending application for the specified project and flat type.
        Parameters:
        applicant - The applicant applying for a BTO flat
        project - The project being applied for
        flatType - The type of flat being applied for
        Returns:
        The created application if successful, null otherwise

      • getApplications

        public java.util.ArrayList<BTOApplication> getApplications​(Applicant applicant)
        Retrieves all applications submitted by an applicant.
        Parameters:
        applicant - The applicant whose applications to retrieve
        Returns:
        List of all applications submitted by the applicant

      • requestWithdrawal

        public boolean requestWithdrawal​(BTOApplication application)
        Requests withdrawal of an application. Changes the application's withdrawal status to pending.
        Parameters:
        application - The application to withdraw
        Returns:
        True if withdrawal request was successful, false otherwise

      • bookFlat

        public boolean bookFlat​(BTOApplication application,
                        FlatType flatType)
        Books a flat for a successful application. Verifies eligibility, creates a booking, and updates related entities.
        Parameters:
        application - The application to book a flat for
        flatType - The type of flat to book
        Returns:
        True if booking was successful, false otherwise

      • submitEnquiry

        public Enquiry submitEnquiry​(Applicant applicant,
                             Project project,
                             java.lang.String content)
        Submits an enquiry about a project. Creates and stores a new enquiry with pending status.
        Parameters:
        applicant - The applicant submitting the enquiry
        project - The project the enquiry is about
        content - The content of the enquiry
        Returns:
        The created enquiry if successful, null otherwise

      • getEnquiries

        public java.util.ArrayList<Enquiry> getEnquiries​(Applicant applicant)
        Retrieves all enquiries submitted by an applicant.
        Parameters:
        applicant - The applicant whose enquiries to retrieve
        Returns:
        List of enquiries submitted by the applicant

      • editEnquiry

        public boolean editEnquiry​(Enquiry enquiry,
                           java.lang.String newContent)
        Edits the content of a pending enquiry. Only allows editing of enquiries with PENDING status.
        Parameters:
        enquiry - The enquiry to edit
        newContent - The new content for the enquiry
        Returns:
        True if edit was successful, false otherwise

      • deleteEnquiry

        public boolean deleteEnquiry​(Enquiry enquiry)
        Deletes an enquiry from the system.
        Parameters:
        enquiry - The enquiry to delete
        Returns:
        True if deletion was successful, false otherwise

      • changePassword

        public boolean changePassword​(Applicant applicant,
                              java.lang.String password)
        Changes an applicant's password. Validates the new password meets requirements.
        Parameters:
        applicant - The applicant whose password to change
        password - The new password
        Returns:
        True if password change was successful, false otherwise

      • isEligibleForProject

        public static boolean isEligibleForProject​(Applicant applicant,
                                           Project project)
        Checks if an applicant is eligible for a specific project. Verifies project visibility, application period, age requirements, and eligibility for at least one flat type.
        Parameters:
        applicant - The applicant to check eligibility for
        project - The project to check eligibility for
        Returns:
        True if the applicant is eligible, false otherwise

      • hasAppliedForProject

        public static boolean hasAppliedForProject​(Applicant applicant,
                                           Project project)
        Checks if an applicant has previously applied for a project.
        Parameters:
        applicant - The applicant to check
        project - The project to check
        Returns:
        True if the applicant has already applied, false otherwise

      • hasActiveApplications

        public boolean hasActiveApplications​(Applicant applicant)
        Checks if an applicant has any active applications. This includes pending, successful, or booked applications that are not withdrawn.
        Parameters:
        applicant - The applicant to check
        Returns:
        True if the applicant has active applications, false otherwise

      • isEligibleForFlatType

        public static boolean isEligibleForFlatType​(Applicant applicant,
                                            FlatTypeEnum flatType)
        Checks if an applicant is eligible for a specific flat type. Applies rules based on marital status and age: - Singles must be 35+ and can only apply for 2-room flats - Married applicants must be 21+
        Parameters:
        applicant - The applicant to check eligibility for
        flatType - The flat type to check eligibility for
        Returns:
        True if the applicant is eligible, false otherwise

      • isValidPassword

        public static boolean isValidPassword​(java.lang.String password)
        Validates that a password meets the required criteria. Currently checks for minimum length of 8 characters.
        Parameters:
        password - The password to validate
        Returns:
        True if the password is valid, false otherwise
